# init(type:location:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a newly allocated text tab with the specified alignment and location.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(type: NSParagraphStyle.TextTabType, location loc: CGFloat)
```

## Discussion

The location is relative to the back margin, based on the line sweep direction of the paragraph. The value in the `type` parameter can be any of the values described in [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSParagraphStyle/TextTabType].

## Deprecated

- **tabStopType**: The text tab’s type of tab stop.

items.description: The text tab’s type of tab stop.
